main_definition: Baskets refer to a container made of woven material, typically used for holding or carrying items; they can also be related to sports teams, particularly basketball team names.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A container made of woven materials like reeds and rushes
meanings_and_examples.example: The farmer carried the fruits in a large wicker basket.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An informal term used to refer to basketball teams, often named after geographic locations or local businesses.
meanings_and_examples.example: The Lakers and Celtics are two of the most storied NBA baskets in American sports history.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In games like horseshoes, a target shaped like a traditional woven basket used for scoring points
meanings_and_examples.example: He threw his horseshoe and it landed perfectly inside the baskets at the end of the pole.
